trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding"></xref> or an <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding"></xref> within an XML Web service, specifying the MIME format for the body of the HTTP transmission.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeContentBinding"></xref> class.
Specifies the URI for the XML namespace of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeContentBinding"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeContentBinding"></xref> applies.

A string representing the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> with which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MimeContentBinding"></xref> is associated.
The default value is an empty string ("").
Gets or sets a value indicating the format of the body of the HTTP transmission.

The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification defines bindings for several MIME types, including text/xml, multipart/related, and application/x-www-form-urlencoded, although any MIME type can be used.
The wildcard character (*) can also be used.
For example, the string "text/\*" would represent all text types.
If the value of this property is not set, the `MimeContentBinding` specifies all MIME types.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
A string indicating the format of the body of the HTTP transmission.
The default value is an empty string ("").
